titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (S. 250) to amend the Carl D. Perkins Vocational and Technical Education Act of 1998 to improve the Act.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-598, by Mr. Bishop (UT).

Upon the adoption of this resolution, it shall be in order to consider the conference report to accompany S. 250. All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as read.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 218.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 946.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/27/2006--Passed House without amendment. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on S. 250 (Carl D. Perkins Career and Technical Education Improvement Act of 2005).
